statements: SELECT * FROM SecurityPatches
SELECT patch_id, software_name, patch_date FROM SecurityPatches WHERE compliance_standard = 'PCI DSS'
SELECT patch_description FROM SecurityPatches WHERE patch_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patch_date DESC
SELECT software_name, patch_date FROM SecurityPatches ORDER BY software_name ASC, patch_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT compliance_standard FROM SecurityPatches
SELECT patch_id, software_name, patch_description, patch_date, compliance_standard FROM SecurityPatches WHERE patch_id = 1 ORDER BY patch_date DESC
SELECT software_name, patch_description FROM SecurityPatches WHERE compliance_standard = 'ISO 27001' LIMIT 10
SELECT software_name, compliance_standard FROM SecurityPatches WHERE patch_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT patch_id, software_name, patch_description FROM SecurityPatches WHERE software_name LIKE '%Windows%' AND compliance_standard IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patch_id ASC
SELECT * FROM SecurityPatches WHERE patch_date < '2020-01-01'
SELECT * FROM security_patches
SELECT patch_id, software_name FROM security_patches WHERE patch_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT standard_name, standard_description FROM compliance_standards
SELECT * FROM security_patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC
SELECT patch_id, patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE software_name LIKE 'Microsoft%'
SELECT * FROM security_patches WHERE patch_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT software_name, patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE patch_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT standard_id, standard_name, standard_description FROM compliance_standards WHERE standard_name LIKE '%ISO%' ORDER BY standard_id;
SELECT * FROM security_patches WHERE software_name = 'Microsoft SQL Server' OR software_name = 'Oracle Database';
SELECT * FROM security_patches WHERE patch_description LIKE '%security%' AND patch_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patch_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_patches;
SELECT software_name, patch_version, release_date FROM security_patches;
SELECT id, patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE patch_version = '1.2';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY compliance_deadline DESC;
SELECT app_name, developer, last_updated FROM software_applications WHERE developer = 'Company A';
SELECT * FROM security_patches ORDER BY release_date DESC, patch_version ASC;
SELECT software_name, patch_version, release_date FROM security_patches WHERE patch_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT software_name, compliance_type, compliance_status, compliance_deadline FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY compliance_deadline ASC;
SELECT app_name, developer, last_updated FROM software_applications WHERE developer LIKE '%Microsoft%' OR developer LIKE '%Google%' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_patches WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM security_patches;
SELECT application_name, version FROM software_applications;
SELECT patch_id, patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT standard_name, description FROM compliance_standards ORDER BY standard_id DESC;
SELECT software_name, patch_description FROM security_patches JOIN patch_compliance ON security_patches.patch_id = patch_compliance.patch_id WHERE patch_compliance.standard_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM security_patches;
SELECT patch_id, software_name FROM security_patches WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT software_name, patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE patch_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM software_applications WHERE version LIKE '1.%';

SELECT software_name, standard_name FROM security_patches INNER JOIN patch_compliance ON security_patches.patch_id = patch_compliance.patch_id INNER JOIN compliance_standards ON patch_compliance.standard_id = compliance_standards.standard_id;
SELECT * FROM software_patches;
SELECT patch_name, patch_date FROM software_patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT software_name, description FROM software_applications WHERE software_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM compliance_standards WHERE standard_name = 'HIPAA';
SELECT software_name, patch_name FROM software_patches JOIN patch_applications ON software_patches.patch_id = patch_applications.patch_id;
SELECT * FROM software_patches;
SELECT patch_name, patch_date FROM software_patches WHERE software_id = 1;
SELECT software_name, description FROM software_applications ORDER BY software_name DESC;

SELECT software_name, standard_name FROM software_applications INNER JOIN software_compliance ON software_applications.software_id = software_compliance.software_id INNER JOIN compliance_standards ON software_compliance.standard_id = compliance_standards.standard_id WHERE compliance_standards.standard_name = 'ISO 27001';

SELECT patch_name, patch_date, software_name, description FROM software_patches JOIN patch_applications ON software_patches.patch_id = patch_applications.patch_id JOIN software_applications ON patch_applications.software_id = software_applications.software_id ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
